The Crown PSienna Millercution Service has also asked a senior QC to`` comprehensively'' re-examine material amassed as part of the original inquiry and any new evidence. In his resignation statement, Mr Andy Coulson said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet.`` Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role.`` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on. Mr Andy Coulson joined Mr David Cameron 's team before the General Election and then ran the PM's communications strategy. Mike Pence Steve Cohen , D-Tennessee, used a late night House floor speech Tuesday to hit Republicans for what he called`` lies'' about a government takeover of the health care system, and evoked Nazi propagandist Joseph Goebbels. They say it's a government takeover of health care, a big lie, just like Goebbels. You say it enough, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie and eventually people believe it, he said. Steve Cohen , who is Jewish, went on to compare that`` lie'' to the term`` blood libel,'' a phrase that historically was used to falsely accuse Jews of killing Christian children.
